lead_paragraph: An article on Friday about the tough job of National Hockey League linesmen misspelled the name of the village near Albany where one such official, Tony Sericolo, lives with his family. It is Altamont, N.Y. — not Altamonte.
snippet: An article on Friday about the tough job of National Hockey League linesmen misspelled the name of the village near Albany where one such official, Tony Sericolo, lives with his family. It is Altamont, N.Y. — not Altamonte.
